snippet: A batch of new Travel Channel shows, from “Xtreme Waterparks” to “Insane Coaster Wars,” seems devised to annoy the summer couch potato.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger asserts that the Travel Channel's summer lineup of extreme vacation shows is designed to ridicule people who are spending their vacations at home; jokingly suggests some new programs that would glorify the staycation.
lead_paragraph: A batch of new Travel Channel shows, from “Xtreme Waterparks” to “Insane Coaster Wars,” seems devised to annoy the summer couch potato.

headline.seo: Travel Channel’s ‘Xtreme Waterparks’ and ‘Insane Coaster Wars’
headline.main: Vacations To Steam All Couch Potatoes
headline.print_headline: Vacations To Steam All Couch Potatoes
